resp = client.indices.create(
    index="books",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "title": {
                "type": "text",
                "copy_to": "title_semantic"
            },
            "description": {
                "type": "text",
                "copy_to": "description_semantic"
            },
            "title_semantic": {
                "type": "semantic_text"
            },
            "description_semantic": {
                "type": "semantic_text"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
